data: {"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3306617,"name":"","username":"acycle044","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/a/a4c791/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-02-10T22:49:47.080Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eThe center column and base pulley connection point on one of our team’s swerve modules was assembled incorrectly last year. During a recent test-drive of our '24 competition bot, both sides of the connection point sheared, leaving the swerve mod unusable. Pictures show the parts after they were cleaned up as well as possible with our team’s facilities- it used to be worse. Anyone got any suggestions for alternatives to buying them new? We really don’t have time to wait on shipping from \u003cspan class=\"abbreviation\"\u003eSDS\u003ctemplate class=\"tooltiptext\" data-text=\"Swerve Drive Specialties\"\u003e\u003c/template\u003e\u003c/span\u003e.
